document.title: Introducing Mastra AI: The Future of AI Agents
document.description: Today, we're excited to announce the launch of Mastra AI, a revolutionary platform for building and deploying intelligent AI agents.

body.raw:
# Introducing Mastra AI

We're thrilled to announce the launch of Mastra AI, our cutting-edge platform for building and deploying intelligent AI agents. After years of research and development, we're finally ready to share our vision for the future of AI with the world.

## Why Mastra AI?

The landscape of AI is rapidly evolving, but one challenge remains constant: building AI systems that can maintain context, learn from interactions, and scale effectively. Mastra AI addresses these challenges head-on with our innovative agent architecture.

### Key Features

- **Advanced Memory Management**: Our agents maintain context across sessions using sophisticated memory systems
- **Cloud Native Design**: Deploy anywhere with our cloud-agnostic infrastructure
- **Enterprise Security**: Bank-grade security with end-to-end encryption
- **Scalable Architecture**: From prototype to production with automatic scaling

## Getting Started

Ready to build your first AI agent? Check out our [documentation](/docs) to get started with Mastra AI today.

document.title: Introduction to Mastra AI
document.description: Learn about the core concepts and features of Mastra AI's agent platform.

body.raw:
# Welcome to Mastra AI

Mastra AI provides a powerful platform for building, deploying, and scaling intelligent AI agents. Our platform makes it easy to create context-aware AI agents that can learn and adapt to your specific needs.

## What are AI Agents?

AI agents are autonomous software entities that can perceive their environment, make decisions, and take actions to achieve specific goals. With Mastra AI, you can create agents that:

- Maintain context across conversations
- Learn from interactions
- Integrate with existing systems
- Scale automatically

## Key Features

### Memory Management
Agents maintain context across sessions using our advanced memory system.

### Cloud Native
Deploy anywhere with our cloud-agnostic infrastructure.

### Security First
Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption.

## Getting Started

Ready to build your first AI agent? Head over to our [Getting Started](/docs/getting-started) guide.
